Name: The Lizartian
About the game: The storm is coming young Lizartian and you have to be prepared... The Lizartian is a top-down action and adventure game in which we will have to explore the distant lands of Dekoto, making our way through bandits and looters. You can move around the Dekoto fighting to get resources, unlock routes by performing special confrontations. When you face the bandits use your machine gun to destroy their ships and if they board you use your ax to get rid of them... and be aware of the life of your lizard!!!
Meta Title: The Lizartian: May 27, 2022, Front North and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Lizartian? Check out the release date (May 27, 2022), developer insights from Front North, and a complete game summary.
